title: "App recognizes suspected mpox rashes using artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "A new app developed by scientists at Stanford Medicine and other institutions can detect skin lesions caused by mpox, previously known as monkeypox, in images with an accuracy of 90%, the researchers found in a study."
